document_data.mainbody:
scarab of life was an enchanted piece of jewelry that could raise the dead.
The scarab was a jeweled beetle set in an ankh.
When worn by a priests brow, the scarab of life enable them to cast cure critical wounds once per day and raise dead once per week. Both powers required uttering a command word. With each use of this items powers there was a one in ten chance that it would lose its magic.
